comments.content:
Hi Eric,

you might like [Sonic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081021154406/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/sonic_extra_bold_ot/?sample_text=EDGE) or [Accelerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20081021154406/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/accelerator/).  
F
